about me

Hello! My name is Daniel Ormisher. I am a web developer, and this is my site. On here you can find information about me and what I'm interested in, what I can do, and see examples of my work. If you wish to speak to me for any reason please don't hesitate to get in touch.

work

For my day job, I work as an work level web developer at ekmSystems, an industry leader in it's field and a fantastic place to work. Below are some examples of my work with ekm.

ekmDomains is an easy to use domain name service which allows users to buy, register and manage their own domain names for online shops and websites created with ekmPowershop and ekmSiteBuilder.
